name: FunFair
description: FunFair (FUN) was built on the Ethereum network by a team based in London with roots in computer gaming. Envisioning the decentralization of the concept behind casinos, FunFair harnesses peer-to-peer technology in combination with cryptography. Having game-creators, operators, and players each utilizing their FUN tokens for fees or revenues, the technology is meant to enable lower costs along with greater transparency in secure gaming experiences said to be fun, fast, and fair.
